title: [Real Ryze Combo] Why is Riot making so many Dark Champions????
body:
Illaoi
Kindred
Ekko
Jhin
Now Aurion Sol

Pros: vicious candor

cons: recycled

Aurion Soul Looks like Kindreds wolf with Nocturnes voice and Claws


Please rework before PBE or release.

replies.body: Wait, what? What are you even saying here? How are Illaoi, Kindred, Ekko and Jihn related in any way?
Nobody knows what Aurelion Sol will look like in game, so please come back with a better argument

> [{quoted}](name=Ultra Combo Ryze,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lOw0kFM3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-02T14:38:42.216+0000)
>
> i win

He was vibrant blues and purples, you stated that he "looks like kindered's wolf with nocturnes voice", neither of those are true. You don't win actually
This post is why Graves can't have a cigar.

Oh let's see, Illaoi: Not evil, just tests your spirit and is a harsh lady. Ekko: Not evil at all. Kindred: ... He is not good, but he is not evil. Word 'death' doesn't mean anyone is evil. Tahm: Evil. Don't you call a huge toad that eats yourself evil?
Anyway, you get the point.
